item.title: Four Helpful Tips to Reduce Fall Risks for Seniors
item.thumbText: Four ways to be proactive about fall prevention title card.
item.metaDescription: No one enjoys tripping and falling to the ground. In this article, we cover four ways to be proactive about fall prevention.
item.seoKeywords: tips for seniors, reduce fall risk, four ways to prevent falling
item.author: Victoria Zeccola
